attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: A recent government initiative to encourage the creation of online 'e-petitions' has put further strain on the already creaking inboxes of UK workers, wastes a lot of everybody's valuable time and threatens to trivialise genuine causes by giving the myspace generation the impression that political change is merely a click away. Furthermore this is an utter waste of public money.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
